contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 23, 1986 D NWABBA Contest (Championship Section)
NWABBA Contest (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest nwabba-championship-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Leisure Centre, Horwich, Lancashire. Choice of The Corsair (Berlioz) or Variations on a Theme by Haydn. Prizes 1st £120 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 12, 2012, 1:59 p.m. Jan. 16, 2015, 5:13 p.m.
1 British Aerospace (Chadderton) Eric Landon Variations on a Theme by Haydn
2 Greenalls Band John Hudson The Corsair
3 Bedford (Leigh) Band Malcolm Brownbill The Corsair
Unknown Result City of Chester Band Mike Caveney Variations on a Theme by Haydn
Unknown Result Lancashire Constabulary Band Richard Evans The Corsair
Withdrawn Trafford Band John Golland
